conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text: I would recommend Brokeback Mountain, which is based on a true story of two men who fall in love with each other, despite being married to others. Another recommendation could be Outside Providence, which is a psychological thriller about a young man named Mike who becomes obsessed with his best friend, who he believes has been murdered.
